item.title: Integration tests with a Docker JUnit Rule
item.description: When writing integration tests, you might have to run a third party server or middleware. Your tests should remain fast to run and you should be able to run them from your IDE. Docker seems a good choice for this task! I just published a small library that contains a JUnit rule allowing you to start Docker containers before your unit tests. If that sounds of interest to you, you should give it a try and tell me what you think!
